title: Coca-Cola Hangar
alt: The scene features a striking display of a Coca-Cola sign with a vintage aviation theme. At the center, a large, round propeller, painted in yellow and brown, protrudes from a red backdrop. The bold Coca-Cola logo, in white cursive lettering, arches above the propeller, while the word 'HANGAR' is prominently displayed beneath it. The clear blue sky above contrasts with the vibrant colors of the sign and the lush greenery in the background, enhancing the overall visual appeal.
